name: Treasure Marina
description:
Treasure Marina - Coin Pusher

I have been developing this game for 6 months as a solo and just completed it to a point where i'm happy it's release worthy and released it this month.

Created in Unity and all artwork done by myself minus the Seagull and most of his cosmetic hats which was done by Kiory Freeman - Lone pigeon design.

It's free to play supported by Ads which i have developed to be mostly optional and as no intrusive as possible.

Still planning on regularly updating and improving regardless of if it gets any downloads so feel free to leave feedback - treasuremarina@gmail.com

Apologies for the poorly edited promo video. Editing is my weak spot.
